overview: Live is a live video of Meat Loaf, recorded at the Wembley Arena in London, on April 29, 1982. According to a misprint on some versions, the songs "Paradise by the Dashboard Light" and "Read 'Em and Weep" were also performed, but neither song was ever released.  Track listing[edit]  1."Bat Out of Hell" - 10:37  2."You Took the Words Right Out of My Mouth" - 5:59  3."Dead Ringer for Love" - 6:06  4."All Revved Up with No Place to Go" - 9:27  5."I'm Gonna Love Her for Both of Us" - 7:59  6."The Promised Land" - 6:21  7."Two Out of Three Ain't Bad" - 5:09  8."All Revved Up" (reprise) - 0:47  All tracks written by Jim Steinman, except "The Promised Land" by Chuck Berry
title: Meat Loaf Live At Wembley 1982
